General.Text: General, 2018, c. 27, s. 418 (Min. of Labour responsible for the administration of the Fed. Contractors Program for Pay Equity)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2018, c. 27, s. 416 (ss. 1 to 184), s. 418 in force on assent 13.12.2018;

Item.Text: — ss. 1 to 171 and 174 to 184 of the Pay Equity Act, as enacted by s. 416, in force SI/2021-36
— ss. 172 and 173 of the Pay Equity Act, as enacted by s. 416, in force SI/2021-36
— s. 417 comes into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 440(3) — Not in force
